XIV.4.A.1.a
.
Who Provides Income Records
The Internal Revenue Service (IRS) provides the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) with unearned income records including retirement income.Â  The Social Security Administration (SSA) provides VA with earned income records.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 4, Section A - Federal Tax Information (FTI) Match:  General Information
